text: Mariah Carey was visibly shocked to learn the news of the mass shooting in Las Vegas, and joins others sending prayers to the 50 dead and hundreds injured at the Route 91 Harvest Festival. Credit : Splash COUNTRY superstar Jason Aldean has been trolled for leaving the stage after shots were fired during his concert in Las Vegas. Twitter users called Aldean a “ coward ” for rushing off the stage during the Route 91 Harvest Festival country music concert in Vegas without warning fans of impending danger. “ Jason Aldean ran off the stage not saying 1 words to the crowd to get out, like a coward... really love the country eh? ” @ commanderinfunk wrote.
